english.segment1: well, it's yours. you can have it if it means that much to you. don't let me stop you. don't let me stop you now
english.segment2: stretch me out across the table. turn my insides out. turn me into someone else. someone more like yourself
english.segment3: stretch me out. bother not with ties, I promise to lie perfectly still. I swear not to scream. at my becoming part of the machine
english.segment4: let it be known that this is what you'll get. for falling out of line. no one wins against the machine. so get back in line
english.segment5: are you the man now. that you got what you wanted. are you the man now. that you got it
